Usually I have several test cases per methods to test various "classes" of=
 inputs (ie. boundary values, special cases, etc), but if the input data is=
 of the same type and really belongs in the same test case I use arrays and=
 setUp method to cycle through the data.  But please note, I only use this =
for cases where if one input fails, the entire test case should fail.

Here=
's a quick example that I use for a software testing course I am helping te=
ach.  The simple example is a triangle classifier based on the lengths of i=
ts side (ie isosceles, equilateral or scalene),  I believe I have provided =
all necessary code to compile.  

I hope this helps (and in fact this is wh=
at you were asking).

andrew f
